title: Just hit honor 5 ... Will I get honor 4 or 5 rewards?
body: I understand that the ranks locked a few days ago but did honor as well?

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure you can still go up and down in honor. Honor wasn't locked just due to end of season AFAIK.

Additional info:  Honor gains are locked for now during end of season, similarly to ranked matches.   You can still gain or lose honor, but rewards are locked for the end of season.  - Porocles

Unfortunately, the rewards are based on your standing as of **November 7 at 23:59 local time**, when the season officially ended. So, in this case, I would expect you to get the cool purple ward this time around.
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

EDIT: Red Post'd
Edit 2: Red Correct'd
